name: LawChain.org
tagline: Liberating the Law One Block at a Time
body:
**What is LawChain?**  
* Read Dazza Greenwood's Medium Post: ["Law Itself is the Killer Blockchain App"](https://medium.com/@dazza/law-itself-is-the-killer-blockchain-app-5ccf7d86d8d8#.bqzhow3y4)

**Where/When Can I learn More?**
* See the Internet livestream of [LegalHackers Global Congress Panel on Blockchain and Law](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/second-annual-legalhackers-global-congress-dazza-greenwood?published=t) for a Sneak-Peek of the LawChain Demo 

**What is This GitHub Repository Used For?**
* This Repo Will be Used for the Open Source Reference Implementation or LawChain

**How Do I Join the Open Source Project Business, Legal or Technical Teams?**
* At this Google Form (also embedded below).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
